<html5:div class="tr-tabs js-page-tabs tr-tabs-{{tabsPosition}} clearfix"> <html5:ul class="tr-tab-buttons js-tab-buttons {{#ifCond navigation "==" "buttons"}}hidden{{/ifCond}}"> {{#each pages}} <html5:li data-page-num="{{@index}}" data-page-id="{{id}}" class="tr-tab-buttons__item"> <html5:span class="tr-tab-label">{{inc @index}}</html5:span> {{#ifCond ../state "==" "question"}} <html5:span class="js-remove-page tr-close-tab icon icon-result-nok"></html5:span> {{/ifCond}} </html5:li> {{/each}} </html5:ul>
<html5:div class="tr-pages-wrap clearfix">
{{#ifCond state "==" "question"}} <html5:li class="add-option js-add-page-before"> <html5:span class="icon-add"></html5:span> Add page </html5:li> {{/ifCond}}
{{#each pages}} <div data-page-num="{{@index}}" data-page-id="{{id}}" class="tr-page js-tab-content tr-tabs-{{@index}}" style="height: {{../pageHeight}}px"> {{#ifCond ../state "==" "question"}} <html5:label class="tr-column-select"> Columns: <html5:select class="select2 js-page-columns-select" data-has-search="false"> <html5:option value="1" {{#ifCond this.content.length "==" 1}}selected {{/ifCond}} >1</html5:option> <html5:option value="2" {{#ifCond this.content.length "==" 2}}selected {{/ifCond}} >2</html5:option> <html5:option value="3" {{#ifCond this.content.length "==" 3}}selected {{/ifCond}} >3</html5:option> </html5:select> </html5:label> {{/ifCond}} <html5:div class="tr-passage widget-blockInteraction"> {{#each content}} <html5:div class="tr-passage-column js-page-column" data-page-col-index="{{@index}}"> {{{this}}} </html5:div> {{/each}} </html5:div> </html5:div> {{/each}}
{{#ifCond state "==" "question"}} <html5:li class="add-option js-add-page-after"> <html5:span class="icon-add"></html5:span> Add page </html5:li> {{/ifCond}} </html5:div>
</html5:div> </html5:script> <html5:script class="text-reader-nav-tpl" type="text/x-handlebars-template"> <![CDATA[ {{#ifCond navigation "!=" "tabs"}} <html5:div class="tr-nav"> <html5:div class="tr-nav__col js-prev-page"> <html5:button class="btn-info small">{{../buttonLabels.prev}}</html5:button> </html5:div> <html5:div class="tr-nav__col"> Page <html5:span class="js-current-page">{{../currentPage}}</html5:span> / {{../pagesNum}} </html5:div> <html5:div class="tr-nav__col js-next-page"> <html5:button class="btn-info small">{{../buttonLabels.next}}</html5:button> </html5:div> </html5:div> {{/ifCond}}
